reference.title: Publications and related information
reference.shortdesc: The following Portable Document Format (PDF) publications and related online information sources are available for the IBM block storage CSI driver.

section.p: To view a PDF file, you need Adobe Reader. You can download it at no charge from the Adobe website.

row.entry: IBM block storage CSI driver publication

This publication describes requirements, compatibility, change log, and known issues information for version 1.6.0.
First Edition (June 2021) for version 1.6.0.

This publication describes how to prepare for, install, configure, and use IBM block storage CSI driver.
Publication number: SC27-9590-10.

section.title: Related information
section.p: For more information storage systems and orchestration platforms that are supported by IBM block storage CSI driver., see the following resources.
